I’m ready to send the confirmation, but I’ll need the specific details you’d like included—typically:

• Exact employee name  
• Job title (and department, if relevant)  
• Employment start date (and, if needed, end date or confirmation of current employment)  
• Employment status (full-time/part-time)  
• Annual or hourly compensation (if you want that disclosed)  
• Any additional wording your HR team prefers (e.g., company letterhead text, disclaimer)

Let me know those items (or direct me to the exact page in your Notion HR notebooks), and I’ll draft and send the email right away.
